EmailTemplate.name: System Master_Sales_Email.Retraction May 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Correction re:Pivotal Field Operations: May Sales News Flash
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
We just noticed there was a broken link in the email re: Pivotal Field Operations: May Sales News Flash. Please click here <https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1zOCuVNQX7vEa0F1zoTu1EA6V0GavDFHWDErktdkEEqU/edit#slide=id.g585bcb2bf_2_159> for detail on the 1H Quota SPIF.
Sorry for the inconvenience.
